52 /* Retrieve paramater, if it doesn't exist return false */
53 template <class T>
54 static bool retrieveParameter(const ros::NodeHandle &nh, const std::string &name, T &value)
55 {
56
57 if (!nh.getParam(name, value))
58 {
59 ROS_WARN_STREAM(" Parameter " << name << " not set on node " << ros::this_node::getName().c_str());
60 return false;
61 }
62 else
63 {
64 return true;
65 }
66 }
67
68 /* Retrieve parameter, if it doesn't exist use the default */
69 template <class T>
70 static void retrieveParameter(const ros::NodeHandle &nh, const std::string &name, T &value, const T &default_value)
71 {
72
73 if (!retrieveParameter(nh, name, value))
74 {
75 ROS_WARN_STREAM(" Setting " << name << " to default value: " << default_value);
76 value = default_value;
77 }
78 }
79};
